definition: luxuriant/buxom/variant of 豐|丰[feng1]/variant of 風|风[feng1]/appearance/charm

sentences.english: It promotes the abundant lives perfectly under the condition of unconsciousness.
sentences.chinese: 他是在不自觉的状态下，完美地促成丰足的生命。

sentences.english: Enough is abundance to the wise.
sentences.chinese: 对聪明人来说，刚够已是丰足了。

sentences.english: We have to store a substantial supply of food for winter.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须为冬季储备丰足的食物供应。

sentences.english: Joy of the plenteous dinner, strong carouse and drinking?
sentences.chinese: 你了解那快乐是丰足的饮宴者，纵情狂欢的饮乐吗？

sentences.english: Welcome to the age of information abundance.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎来到这信息丰足的时代。

sentences.english: It promotes the abundant lives perfectly under the condition of unconsciousness .
sentences.chinese: 他都是在不自觉的状态下，完美地促成丰足的生命。

definition: copious/plentiful (of water)/surging (of waves)/refers to home village of first Han emperor 漢高祖|汉高祖[Han4 Gao1 zu3]/fig. majestic
Anle district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan
having ample food and clothing (idiom); well fed and clothed
